A train crashes in Soweto, South Africa and injures more than 640 passengers.
In Turkey, a 6.0 magnitude earthquake kills at least three and injures more than 70.
President Ali Abdullah Saleh calls for early presidential elections to end bloodshed.
Former International Monetary Fund head, Dominique Strauss-Kahn, has been granted bail pending his trial.
Youths camp out in Central Madrid to protest against the political establishment.
The crew of the space shuttle Endeavor begins its first space walk.
